title: Marvel Studios
description: Marvel Studios, LLC is an American film and television production company. Marvel Studios is the creator of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, a media franchise and shared universe of films and television series produced by the studio, based on characters that appear in Marvel Comics publications.
pageDescription: Explore the complete Marvel Studios cinematic journey with our comprehensive roadmap. All movies, series, one-shots, and specials, our interactive map allows you to track your progress, mark each installment as completed, and seamlessly navigate through the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
pageKeywords: marvel studios roadmap, marvel cinematic universe guide, marvel movie series tracker, marvel one-shots checklist, marvel specials completion tracker, marvel movie viewing order, marvel cinematic universe roadmap, marvel movie roadmap, marvel movie checklist, marvel movie progress tracker, all marvel movies in order, Avengers, Spider-Man, X-Men, Defenders, Agents of SHIELD, Venom, Old Marvel, One-Shot, Eternals, Runaways, Inhumans, Cloak&Dagger, Helstrom

titles.title: Iron Man
titles.description: When Tony Stark, an industrialist, is captured, he constructs a high-tech armoured suit to escape. Once he manages to escape, he decides to use his suit to fight against evil forces to save the world.

titles.title: WandaVision
titles.description: Vision and Wanda live a normal life in Westview and conceal their superpowers. However, as decades pass by, they start doubting that everything is not what it seems.

titles.title: Spider-Man
titles.description: Peter Parker, a shy and awkward high school student, is often bullied by people, including his best friend. His life changes when he is bitten by a genetically altered spider and gains superpowers.

titles.title: X-Men
titles.description: Magneto kidnaps Marie, a young mutant, with the intention of using her powers to destroy humanity. However, the X-Men and Wolverine team up to save her and stop Magneto.

titles.title: Daredevil season 1
titles.description: Matt Murdock manages to overcome the challenges that he faces due to him being blind since childhood and fights criminals as a lawyer and Daredevil.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 1
titles.description: Agent Phil Coulson leads a team of highly skilled agents from the global law-enforcement organisation known as S.H.I.E.L.D. Together, they combat extraordinary and inexplicable threats.

titles.title: Venom
titles.description: While trying to take down Carlton, the CEO of Life Foundation, Eddie, a journalist, investigates experiments of human trials. Unwittingly, he gets merged with a symbiotic alien with lethal abilities.

titles.title: Blade
titles.description: Deacon Frost, a vampire, kills the elders of the underground vampiric society in order to gain control over his kind. To cement his powers, he needs the blood of Blade, a half-human vampire hunter.

titles.title: The Consultant
titles.description: Agent Coulson stops at a convenience store and deals with a coincidental robbery during his visit.

titles.title: Werewolf by Night
titles.description: On a dark and sombre night, a secret cabal of monster hunters emerge from the shadows and gather at the Bloodstone Temple following the death of their leader; the attendees are thrust into a mysterious and deadly competition for a powerful relic.

titles.title: Eternals
titles.description: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings with superhuman powers who have secretly lived on Earth for thousands of years, reunite to battle the evil Deviants.

titles.title: Runaways season 1
titles.description: A group of teenagers discover the real identity of their parents and run away from their homes. They try to discover the secrets of their origins and also to thaw their parents' sinister plans.

titles.title: The Incredible Hulk
titles.description: Dr Bruce Banner subjects himself to high levels of gamma radiation, which triggers his transformation into a huge green creature, the Hulk, whenever he experiences negative emotions such as anger.

titles.title: Iron Man 2
titles.description: Tony Stark is under pressure from various sources, including the government, to share his technology with the world. He must find a way to fight them while also tackling his other enemies.

titles.title: Thor
titles.description: Thor is exiled by his father, Odin, the King of Asgard, to the Earth to live among mortals. When he lands on Earth, his trusted weapon Mjolnir is discovered and captured by S.H.I.E.L.D.

titles.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
titles.description: During World War II, Steve Rogers decides to volunteer in an experiment that transforms his weak body. He must now battle a secret Nazi organisation headed by Johann Schmidt to defend his nation.

titles.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer
titles.description: Agents Coulson and Sitwell plan to derail General Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross from interfering with S.H.I.E.L.D. affairs with a special person.

titles.title: The Avengers
titles.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

titles.title: Item 47
titles.description: SHIELD agent Sitwell is assigned to recover an abandoned Chitauri weapon being used by a couple robbing a bank.

titles.title: Iron Man 3
titles.description: Suffering from PTSD, Tony Stark encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. When he watches his world fall apart, he must rely on his own instincts as he embarks on a journey of retribution.

titles.title: Agent Carter
titles.description: British operative Peggy Carter joins the nascent S.H.I.E.L.D. organization in search of the "Zodiac" key. Agent Carter also battles her misogynistic, bureaucratic boss, Agent Flynn.

titles.title: Thor: The Dark World
titles.description: While investigating a phenomenon, Jane gets sucked into a wormhole. Thor learns about her disappearance and returns to earth just as she reappears. But sensing something amiss, he takes her to Asgard.

titles.title: All Hail the King
titles.description: A documentary filmmaker (Scoot McNairy) interviews "Mandarin" impersonator Trevor Slattery (Ben Kingsley) to unlock the secrets of his past and find out if the terrorist group the Ten Rings really exists.

titles.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
titles.description: Steve Rogers, along with Black Widow and Falcon, must uncover the secrets hidden within S.H.I.E.L.D., while also battling a dangerous new enemy, who is only known as The Winter Soldier.

titles.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
titles.description: A bunch of skilled criminals led by brash adventurer Peter Quill join hands to fight a villain named Ronan the Accuser who wants to control the universe with the help of a mystical orb.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 2
titles.description: The second season follows Phil Coulson and his team of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and allies as they attempt to rebuild the organization after it was revealed to have been infiltrated by Hydra

titles.title: Agent Carter season 1
titles.description: Life changes for Peggy Carter after her boyfriend Steve Rogers is feared dead. Now she leads a dual life by doing administrative work as well as working as a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent under Howard Stark.

titles.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
titles.description: Tony Stark builds an artificial intelligence system named Ultron with the help of Bruce Banner. When the sentient Ultron makes plans to wipe out the human race, the Avengers set out to stop him.

titles.title: Ant-Man
titles.description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, pull off a plan that will save the world.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 3
titles.description: The third season follows Phil Coulson and his team of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and Inhumans as they face new threats to the world.

titles.title: Jessica Jones season 1
titles.description: After Jessica meets an intelligent psychopath, he advises her to repair her relationship with Trish in order to take him down. However, a lot of heroic ideas stand against this union.

titles.title: Agent Carter season 2
titles.description: Peggy Carter moves to Los Angeles to deal with the threats of the new atomic age in the wake of World War II, gaining new friends, a new home, and potential new love.

titles.title: Daredevil season 2
titles.description: Matt Murdock / Daredevil, a blind lawyer-by-day who fights crime at night, crossing paths with the deadly Frank Castle / Punisher along with the return of an old girlfriend - Elektra Natchios.

titles.title: Captain America: Civil War
titles.description: When the collective governments decide to ratify the Sokovia Accords, a legal document that regulates superhuman activity, it leads to a discordance between Captain America and Iron Man.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 4
titles.description: The fourth season follows Phil Coulson and other S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and allies after the signing of the Sokovia Accords.

titles.title: Luke Cage season 1
titles.description: Luke Cage undergoes an experiment that accidentally gives him superpowers and makes his skin unbreakable. Things take an unexpected turn when he starts fighting corruption.

titles.title: Doctor Strange
titles.description: In an accident, Stephen Strange, a famous neurosurgeon, loses the ability to use his hands. He goes to visit the mysterious Ancient One to heal himself and becomes a great sorcerer under her tutelage.

titles.title: Iron Fist season 1
titles.description: Danny Rand decides it is time to return to New York after 15 years. Things take a turn when he tries to claim his family's company from Harold Meachum.

titles.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
titles.description: After a successful mission, Quill and his team of galactic defenders meet Ego, a man claiming to be Quill's father. However, they soon learn some disturbing truths about Ego.

titles.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
titles.description: Peter Parker tries to stop Adrian 'The Vulture' Toomes from selling weapons made with advanced Chitauri technology while trying to balance his life as an ordinary high school student.

titles.title: The Defenders season 1
titles.description: Four superheroes and vigilantes unite their powers in order to fight the Hand, a supervillain who threatens to destroy New York City.

titles.title: Thor: Ragnarok
titles.description: Deprived of his mighty hammer Mjolnir, Thor must escape the other side of the universe to save his home, Asgard, from Hela, the goddess of death.

titles.title: The Punisher season 1
titles.description: After exacting revenge on the people responsible for the deaths of his wife and children, Frank Castle uncovers a conspiracy that runs deeper than New York's criminal underworld. Now known as the Punisher, he must dig deep into the conspiracy to discover the truth about injustices that affect more than just him and his family. Assisting the vigilante in his quest to fight criminals are best friend Billy Russo, who runs private military corporation Anvil, and former NSA analyst Micro, who shares common enemies with Castle and helps him as part of a so-called marriage of convenience.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 5
titles.description: The fifth season follows Phil Coulson and other S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and allies as they try to save the world from an apocalyptic future.

titles.title: Black Panther
titles.description: After his father's death, T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to inherit his throne. However, a powerful enemy related to his family threatens to attack his nation.

titles.title: Jessica Jones season 2
titles.description: The second season follows Jones as she takes on a new case after the events surrounding her encounter with Kilgrave

titles.title: Avengers: Infinity War
titles.description: The Avengers must stop Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, from getting his hands on all the infinity stones. However, Thanos is prepared to go to any lengths to carry out his insane plan.

titles.title: Inhumans season 1
titles.description: After a coup attempt by the military against King Black Bolt, the people of Attilan must find a way to escape and survive persecution.

titles.title: Cloak & Dagger season 1
titles.description: After the collapse of an oil rig, two runaway teenagers acquire superpowers and get into trouble with a drug cartel. Things get even more complicated when they start falling for each other.

titles.title: Luke Cage season 2
titles.description: Luke Cage become a hero and celebrity in Harlem after clearing his name, only to face a new threat.

titles.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
titles.description: Despite being under house arrest, Scott Lang, along with the Wasp, sets out to help Dr Hank Pym to enter the quantum realm as they face new enemies along the way.

titles.title: Iron Fist season 2
titles.description: The second and final season follows Danny Rand / Iron Fist, a martial arts expert with the ability to call upon the power of the Iron Fist.

titles.title: Daredevil season 3
titles.description: The third and final season follows Matt Murdock / Daredevil, a blind lawyer-by-day who fights crime at night.

titles.title: Runaways season 2
titles.description: The Runaways have left their homes (and evil parents) behind and now have to learn to live on their own. As they scavenge for food, search for shelter, and take care of one another, our kids begin to realize that, for better or worse, they're stuck with each other. And it's up to them to take down PRIDE once and for all. But someone sent a mysterious message to Jonah... Is there a mole in the Runaways? Meanwhile, PRIDE is focused on finding their children, and Jonah has his own dangerous plan in mind.

titles.title: The Punisher season 2
titles.description: The second and final season revolves around Frank Castle saving a girl from being murdered, forcing him to decide if he should embrace his life as the Punisher.

titles.title: Captain Marvel
titles.description: An ex-U.S. Air Force fighter pilot and member of an elite Kree military unit called Starforce. She was imbued with superhuman strength, energy projection, and flight after exposure to Tesseract energy.

titles.title: Cloak & Dagger season 2
titles.description: The second and final season sees Tandy Bowen and Tyrone Johnson use their superpowers together

titles.title: Avengers: Endgame
titles.description: After Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, disintegrates half of the universe, the Avengers must reunite and assemble again to reinvigorate their trounced allies and restore balance.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 6
titles.description: The sixth season follows S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and allies as they try to save humanity following the death of director Phil Coulson.

titles.title: Jessica Jones season 3
titles.description: The third and final season follows Jones as she teams up with her mother's killer, Trish Walker, to take down a highly intelligent psychopath until a devastating loss reveals conflicting ideals that pits them against each other.

titles.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
titles.description: Peter Parker, the beloved superhero Spider-Man, faces four destructive elemental monsters while on holiday in Europe. Soon, he receives help from Mysterio, a fellow hero with mysterious origins.

titles.title: Runaways season 3
titles.description: The Runaways frantically search for their captured friends Chase Stein, Gert Yorkes, and Karolina Dean. The kids go head to head with an unstoppable enemy who has targeted Leslie — or more accurately, the child she's carrying. Nico Minoru draws them all into a dark realm where its ruler Morgan le Fay is much more nefarious than anyone the kids have yet to face.

titles.title: Agents of SHIELD season 7
titles.description: The seventh and final season follows S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and allies as they try to prevent an alien occupation while stranded in time.

titles.title: Helstrom
titles.description: Despite being the children of a mysterious serial killer, Daimon and Ana Helstrom use their unique skills to track down the worst of humanity.

titles.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
titles.description: Falcon and the Winter Soldier are a mismatched duo who team up for a global adventure that will test their survival skills -- as well as their patience.

titles.title: Loki
titles.description: After stealing the Tesseract, Loki comes into contact with a mysterious organization that gives him an ominous ultimatum, either fix the timeline or cease to exist completely.

titles.title: Black Widow
titles.description: Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy, and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

titles.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
titles.description: Shang-Chi, a martial artist, lives a quiet life after he leaves his father and the shadowy Ten Rings organisation behind. Years later, he is forced to confront his past when the Ten Rings attack him.

titles.title: Hawkeye
titles.description: Clint Barton and Kate Bishop shoot a few arrows and try to avoid becoming the target themselves.

titles.title: Spider-Man 2
titles.description: Peter Parker is dissatisfied with life as he loses his job, the love of his life, Mary Jane, and his powers. Amid all the chaos, he must fight Doctor Octopus who threatens to destroy New York City.

titles.title: Spider-Man 3
titles.description: Peter Parker becomes one with a symbiotic alien that bolsters his Spider-Man avatar and affects his psyche. He also has to deal with Sandman and maintain a fragmented relationship with Mary Jane.

titles.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
titles.description: Peter Parker, an outcast high school student, gets bitten by a radioactive spider and attains superpowers. While unraveling his parents' disappearance, he must fight against the Lizard.

titles.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
titles.description: As Spider-Man, Peter Parker confronts foes who are far more powerful than him, when Oscorp, owned by his childhood friend Harry Osborn, unleashes a slew of genetically modified villains against him.

titles.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
titles.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, our friendly neighborhood web-slinger is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life as Peter Parker from the high stakes of being a superhero. When Peter asks for help from Doctor Strange, the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

titles.title: Moon Knight
titles.description: Steven Grant and mercenary Marc Spector investigate the mysteries of the Egyptian gods from inside the same body.

titles.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
titles.description: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other-universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse.

titles.title: Ms Marvel
titles.description: Kamala is a superhero fan with an imagination, particularly when it comes to Captain Marvel; Kamala feels like she doesn't fit in at school and sometimes even at home, that is until she gets superpowers like the heroes she's looked up to.

titles.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
titles.description: Thor embarks on a journey unlike anything he's ever faced -- a quest for inner peace. However, his retirement gets interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods. To combat the threat, Thor enlists the help of King Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who -- to his surprise -- inexplicably wields his magical hammer. Together, they set out on a harrowing cosmic adventure to uncover the mystery of the God Butcher's vengeance.

titles.title: I Am Groot season 1
titles.description: Mischievous toddler Baby Groot learns to grow up among the stars with the help of his friends and family in the dishevelled Guardians of the Galaxy superhero team.

titles.title: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
titles.description: Jennifer Walters has a complicated life as a single, 30-something attorney who also happens to be a green 6-foot-7-inch superpowered hulk.

titles.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
titles.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa. Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect the kingdom of Wakanda from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's death.

titles.title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
titles.description: The Guardians are on a mission to make Christmas unforgettable for Quill and head to Earth in search of the perfect present.

titles.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania
titles.description: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania is a 2023 American superhero film based on Marvel Comics featuring the characters Scott Lang / Ant-Man and Hope Pym / Wasp.

titles.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 3
titles.description: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill must rally his team to defend the universe and protect one of their own. If the mission is not completely successful, it could possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.

titles.title: Secret Invasion
titles.description: Nick Fury learns of a secret invasion of Earth by a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls; Fury joins his allies, and together they race against time to thwart an imminent Skrull invasion and save humanity.

titles.title: I Am Groot season 2
titles.description: Baby Groot finds himself exploring the universe and beyond aboard the Guardians' spaceships, coming face-to-face—or nose-to-nose—with new and colorful creatures and environments.

titles.title: Loki season 2
titles.description: The second season sees Loki working with Mobius M. Mobius, Hunter B-15, and other members of the Time Variance Authority to navigate the multiverse in order to find Sylvie, Ravonna Renslayer, and Miss Minutes.

titles.title: The Marvels
titles.description: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. However, unintended consequences see her shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with two other superheroes to form the Marvels.

titles.title: Echo
titles.description: Maya Lopez's ruthless behavior in New York City catches up with her in her hometown; she must face her past, reconnect with her Native American roots and embrace the meaning of family and community.

titles.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
titles.description: Eddie Brock tries to revive his failing career by interviewing a serial killer, Cletus Kasady, who is on death row. When Carnage gains control over Cletus's body, he escapes from the prison.

titles.title: X2
titles.description: Nightcrawler, a mutant, tries to murder the president of the United States. Meanwhile, when William Stryker attacks Professor X's school, his mutant students team up to thwart his evil plans.

titles.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
titles.description: A cure to treat mutations is found by Worthington Labs, drawing lines between the X-Men and regular people. The X-Men are horrified by this announcement and the Magneto-led band prepare to oppose it.

titles.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
titles.description: After years of working as a mutant mercenary, Logan lives a quiet life with his girlfriend, Kayla. However, a figure from his past brutally assassinates Kayla, compelling Logan to seek vengeance.

titles.title: X-Men: First Class
titles.description: During the 1960s, Charles and Erik, young mutants, begin assembling a group of mutants to save humanity. As they grow closer, they learn that their ideologies will force them to take separate paths.

titles.title: The Wolverine
titles.description: Logan travels to Tokyo to meet Yashida, an old acquaintance who is dying. The situation regresses when Yashida offers to take away his healing abilities, but Logan refuses.

titles.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
titles.description: Wolverine time-travels to 1973 to prevent Mystique from killing Bolivar Trask, an evil military scientist, whose murder had led to the creation of robots meant to slaughter humans and mutants.

titles.title: Deadpool
titles.description: Ajax, a twisted scientist, experiments on Wade Wilson, a mercenary, to cure him of cancer and give him healing powers. However, the experiment leaves Wade disfigured and he decides to exact revenge.

titles.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
titles.description: The all-powerful mutant Apocalypse, who is long revered as a god, wants to cause extinction on earth. The X-Men must work together to demolish his plans.

titles.title: Logan
titles.description: Logan comes out of retirement to escort a young mutant named Laura to a safe place. He meets with other mutants, who run from an evil corporation that has been experimenting with them, along the way.

titles.title: Deadpool 2
titles.description: Deadpool protects a young mutant Russell from the authorities and gets thrown in prison. However, he escapes and forms a team of mutants to prevent a time-travelling mercenary from killing Russell.

titles.title: Dark Phoenix
titles.description: After a mishap, Jean Grey is struck by a powerful ray of energy which she absorbs into her body, turning her into an uncontrollable liability for the X-Men.

titles.title: The New Mutants
titles.description: Five young mutants who have suffered traumatic experiences are admitted into a secret facility. Soon after, they begin experiencing visions of their past and doubt the safety of the facility.

titles.title: Blade 2
titles.description: A rare mutation gives birth to a new vampire community called the Reapers, who attack both humans and vampires. Blade, along with an elite vampire force, is asked to wipe out the Reaper's population.

titles.title: Daredevil
titles.description: Matt Murdoch, a blind lawyer, vows to fight crime in New York City and assumes a secret identity of Daredevil. However, his mission attracts the ire of Kingpin, who is determined to kill him.

titles.title: Hulk
titles.description: After being exposed to dangerous levels of radiation, a scientist, Bruce Banner, transforms into an angry green monster at the slightest hint of conflict.

titles.title: The Punisher
titles.description: The family of Frank Castle, an FBI agent, is slaughtered by a corrupt businessman who has ties with the underworld. Determined to kill the man and rid the world of evil, he becomes a vigilante.

titles.title: Blade: Trinity
titles.description: Blade, who fights a lone battle with the vampires, is forced to join hands with the Nightstalkers who are vampire hunters. His task becomes difficult when he is challenged by the invincible Dracula.

titles.title: Elektra
titles.description: Elektra, a warrior, faces a life-threatening situation, after which she decides to work as an assassin. When she is tasked to kill an innocent man and his daughter, she decides to protect them.

titles.title: Fantastic Four
titles.description: Four astronauts gain extraordinary powers like invisibility and stretchability after being hit by cosmic radiation. Now, their biggest challenge is Victor Von Doom, an evil doctor.

titles.title: Ghost Rider
titles.description: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze makes a deal with the Devil to save his father. Years later, the Devil returns and gives Johnny special powers so he can destroy Blackheart, the Devil's son.

titles.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
titles.description: As Reed and Sue start a new life together, The Fantastic Four learn about the mysteriously powerful Silver Surfer and his intention of destroying Earth, and they must do all they can to defeat him.

titles.title: Punisher: War Zone
titles.description: Frank Castle, a former military officer, turns into a ruthless vigilante under the pseudonym Punisher, after Jigsaw, a gangster kills, his family.

titles.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
titles.description: A French priest seeks the Ghost Rider's help to save a young boy from the devil. In exchange, he offers to return Johnny's soul, but in order to succeed Johnny must first confront his own demons.

titles.title: Fantastic Four
titles.description: Four youngsters gain unique superpowers after being teleported to an alternate universe. They must unite and use their powers to fight against a computer mechanic, who transforms into an evil doctor.

titles.title: Team Thor: Part 1
titles.description: What Thor might have been doing while the rest of the Avengers were battling each other in "Captain America: Civil War."

titles.title: Team Thor: Part 2
titles.description: A continuation of the documentary spoof of what Thor and his roommate Darryl were up to during the events of "Captain America: Civil War". While Cap and Iron Man duke it out, Thor tries to pay Darryl his rent in Asgardian coins.

titles.title: Deadpool: No Good Deed
titles.description: Deadpool sees an opportunity to save the day, but it doesn't go entirely as planned.

titles.title: Team Darryl
titles.description: Fresh off being unseated as the ruler of Sakaar, the Grandmaster makes his way to Earth to start a new life. It's been over a year since Thor left Australia and Darryl has been struggling to pay his rent. Now Darryl needs a new roommate to help make the monthly payments. Unfortunately for Darryl, the Grandmaster was the only one who answered Darryl's "Roommate Needed" ad and with no viable options, the Grandmaster moves in.

titles.title: Peter's To-Do List
titles.description: On the eve of his departure to Europe, Peter Parker tells Ned Leeds that he has several things to do before they leave.
